description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 10 (Materials - external fabric cladding element only) of planning permission ref. 49467/APP/2022/2801, dated 07-10-2022 (Partial demolition and extension to existing building to provide additional self-storage floorspace (Use Class B8) with associated new car and cycle parking, refuse storage, landscaping and other associated works ancillary to the development).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The details hereby approved relate to the partial discharge Condition 10 (Materials - external fabric cladding element only) of planning permission ref. 49467/APP/2022/2801, dated 07-10-2022. The applicant is advised that the remaining parts of Condition 10, including all other proposed materials are required to be discharged. For clarity, only the cladding details shown on document ref. 21065GA_21_500A External Material As Proposed Fabric Specification are approved.
